HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"Mercedes have launched a new version of the Smart Car. It won't start if a woman is in the driver's seat."
"I have nothing against gay people but if if I'm out in public and see two guys holding hands or some shit I wanna throw up. Natural reaction"
"TAKE A HIKE, KIKE"
"does Jew nut taste like pennies?"

"NIGGERS"
"All you anorexic bitches can kiss my fat ass."
"notice every made up gender is some weird ass combination of male and female? why is that"
